item.description:
Burn the calories, then recharge right back!

The skating rink is an indoor facility with waterfront views of the Boston harbour. Skating is free and you need only to pay for skate rentals. When we're done skating, we can head next door (a couple of streets actually) to grab some excellent Italian food.

Ice Skating (at 7:00pm):
Where: Steriti Memorial Rink, 561 Commercial Street, Boston (617)523-9327
When: 7:00pm
Cost: $5 (including skate rentals)
Reviews: http://www.yelp.com/b...

Dinner (at 8:00pm):
Where: Antico Forno, 93 Salem St, Boston (617) 723-6733
When: 8:00pm
Info: http://www.anticoforn...
Reviews: http://www.yelp.com/b...

Please note that skating is at 7:00pm and dinner at 8:00. Feel free to attend either or both events - just let me know if you're not coming for both.
item.name: Ice skating (indoor) + Dinner
